verses.content: LALPAIN hieng ang hin a tih, “Moab bawsietna pathum leiin, anih, pali leiin, a hremna sukbo naw ning; Edom lal ruhai chu chinai ang hiela a raw leiin,
chuleiin, Moab chungah mei tir ka ta, Kerioth lal inhai chu kâng vawng a ta; chun, Moab chu buoina le khêk ri le tawtawrâwt riin thîng a ta,
chu laia rorêltu chu sukbo ka ta, a mi lienhai po po chu, ama leh that ka tih,” LALPA chun a tih.
LALPAIN hieng ang hin a tih, “Juda bawsietna pathum leiin, anih, pali leiin, a hremna sukbo naw ning; LALPA dân chu an pawm nawh a, a thupêkhai chu an vawng nawh a;
an pahai chîng hlak khêlhrilhai khan anni chu a ṭhuoi hmang leiin; chuleiin, Juda chunga chun mei tir ka ta, Jerusalem khaw lal inhai chu kâng vawng a tih,” tiin.
LALPAIN hieng ang hin a tih, “Israel bawsietna pathum leiin, anih, pali leiin, a hremna sukbo naw ning; tangka mana mi fel an zawr lei le kekawk bun khat mana mi tlasam an zawr leiin;
rimsi lu chunga pilvut phul châk ngawi ngawi le, zainêmhai lampui sukkâwipêk hlakhai chu: chun, mi pakhat chu a pa leh nunghâk pakhat kuoma ka hming sukse dingin an fe hmunkhat hlak a!
mâichâm tin bula puon siekham chunga chun an zâl hlak a, an Pathien ina chun mi an inchawitir manhai chun uoin an dâwn hlak a.
“Nisienlakhawm, anni hmaah Amor mihai sidar thing anga insâng le thingsaisuo anga hrât khawm kha ka sukbohmang tah a; a chungtienga a ra le, a hnuoitienga a zung khawm ka sukbo a.
Amor mihai ram chu nei dingin Aigupta rama inthawkin ka ṭhuoi suok cheu a, thlalêra khan kum sâwmli sûngin ka ṭhuoi cheu a.
Chun, zâwlnei ni dingin in naupasalhai laia mi le Nazirit dâm ni dingin in tlangvâlhai laia mi ka siem a, Aw Israel nauhai, chuong ang chu a ni nâwm a nih?” LALPAIN a tih.
“Nisienlakhawm, Nazirit mihai kuomah uoin dâwn ding in pêk a, zâwlneihai kuomah, ‘Thu hril naw ro’, tiin thu in pêk a.
Ngai ta u, buphala sip, tawlailîr ichîl angin in hmuna khan nam ka ti cheu.
Chun, mi tlân hrâthai hrâtna chu bo a ta, mi hrâtin a tha chu sukhrât thei bawk naw ni; mi hrâttak khawm inhum thei naw nih a,
thalngul hmangtu khawm chu ngîr thei bawk naw ni; ngalhrât mi khawm inhum thei bawk naw ni; sakawr chung chuong mi khawm inhum thei bawk naw nih;
chu nia chun mi thilthawthei- tak laia mi huoisen khawm chu sa- ruokin tlân hmang a tih,” LALPAIN a tih.
